item.title: Susie add a quote by Naomi Shihab Nye
item.description: "I love the solitude of reading. I love the deep dive into someone else's story, the delicious ache of a last page." -- Naomi Shihab Nye

item.title: Susie add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Every second he breathed, the smell of the grass, the cool air on his face, was so precious: To think that people had years and years, time to waste, so much time it dragged, and he was clinging to each second." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Susie add a quote by Howard Dully
item.description: "We are all victims of what is done to us. We can either use that as an excuse for failure, knowing that if we fail it isn't really our fault, or we can say, 'I want something better than that, I deserve something better than that, and i'm going to try to make myself a life worth living." -- Howard Dully

item.title: Susie add a quote by Kathleen Thompson Norris
item.description: "Just the knowledge that a good book is awaiting one at the end of a long day makes that day happier. " -- Kathleen Thompson Norris

item.title: Susie add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Life has no meaning. Each of us has meaning and we bring it to life. It is a waste to be asking the question when you are the answer." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Susie add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "We must be willing to let go of the life we planned so as to have the life that is waiting for us." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Susie add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "If you do follow your bliss you put yourself on a kind of track that has been there all the while, waiting for you, and the life that you ought to be living is the one you are living. Follow your bliss and don't be afraid, and doors will open where you didn't know they were going to be." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Susie add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors for you where there were only walls." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Susie add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "The privilege of a lifetime is being who you are." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Susie add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Susie add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "People say that what we’re all seeking is a meaning for life. I don’t think that’s what we’re really seeking. I think that what we’re seeking is an experience of being alive, so that our life experiences on the purely physical plane will have resonances with our own innermost being and reality, so that we actually feel the rapture of being alive." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Susie add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "If you are falling....dive." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Susie add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "If the path before you is clear, you're probably on someone else's." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Susie add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Life is like arriving late for a movie, having to figure out what was going on without bothering everybody with a lot of questions, and then being unexpectedly called away before you find out how it ends." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Susie add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Find a place inside where there's joy, and the joy will burn out the pain." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Susie add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Sit in a room and read--and read and read. And read the right books by the right people. Your mind is brought onto that level, and you have a nice, mild, slow-burning rapture all the time." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Susie add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Your sacred space is where you can find yourself over and over again." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Susie add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Myths are public dreams, dreams are private myths." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Susie add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "All religions are true but none are literal." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Susie add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "We're not on our journey to save the world but to save ourselves. But in doing that you save the world. The influence of a vital person vitalizes." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Susie add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Half the people in the world think that the metaphors of their religious traditions, for example, are facts. And the other half contends that they are not facts at all. As a result we have people who consider themselves believers because they accept metaphors as facts, and we have others who classify themselves as atheists because they think religious metaphors are lies." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Susie add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "The goal of life is to make your heartbeat match the beat of the universe to match your nature with Nature." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Susie add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Where you stumble and fall, there you will find gold." -- Joseph Campbell
